# Charville (ward)

Charville is an electoral ward in the London Borough of Hillingdon. The ward was first used in the 1978 elections and elects two councillors to Hillingdon London Borough Council. It was previously used from 1964 to 1978.
Geography
The ward is named after the Charville Lane Estate.
